= SPINAL CORD STRUCTURE =

== BASIC INFORMATIOIN ==

http://www.dartmouth.edu/~humananatomy/figures/chapter_3/3-2_files/image002.jpg

  * regions - cervical (C1-C8), thoracic (T1-T12), lumbar (L1-L5), sacral (S1-S5), coccygeal (CX = CX1-CX3)
  * width - 1 cm (thoracic/sacral) /2 cm (cervical-lumbar)
  * height - 45 cm (men)/43 cm (women)

== SPINAL CORD TRACTS ==
(generated)

TRACT SET: *Ascending Tracts*

<img src="http://intranet.tdmu.edu.ua/data/kafedra/internal/anatomy/classes_stud/en/med/lik/ptn/1/19%20SPINAL%20CORD.%20BASE%20OF%20THE%20BRAIN.files/image044.jpg">

 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anterolateral_system TRACT]: *anterolateral system*; function: conveys pain, temperature (protopathic sensation), and crude touch from the periphery to the brain
  * TRACT: *spinothalamic tract*; function: transmits information to thalamus about pain, temperature, itch and crude touch (conscious)
   * TRACT: *paleospinothalamic tract*; function: transmits pain mainly from the peripheral slow-chronic type C pain fibers (cervical-anterior-toward-contralateral, thoracic, lumbar, sacral-lateral slices)
    * TRACT: *anterior spinothalamic tract* (anterolateral tract); function: crude, nondiscriminative or light touch; path: {skin - slow pain, temperature, slightly tactile} -> {BA 3,1,2}
     * slow pain, temperature, slightly tactile (head and body MD,MC,PC,HF receptors -> S1/C): [BrainRegionhead and body MD,MC,PC,HF receptors head and body MD,MC,PC,HF receptors] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionFD_TH_VPL FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 S1]
   * TRACT: *trigeminothalamic tract* (neospinothalamic tract); function: all somatosensory submodalities from head
    * TRACT: *trigeminothalamic tract, location*; function: awareness of the exact location of the painful stimulus; path: {head} -> {SI - BA 1,2}
     * nociceptors (head, face and intraoral structures nociceptors -> S1/A-delta): [BrainRegionhead, face and intraoral structures nociceptors head, face and intraoral structures nociceptors] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR HMA.HM.TGM.STR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 S1]
     * nociceptors (nociceptors of cranial nerves VII -> S1/A-delta): [BrainRegionnociceptors of cranial nerves VII nociceptors of cranial nerves VII] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_GNG AVA.PN.SG.GNG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR HMA.HM.TGM.STR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 S1]
     * nociceptors (nociceptors of cranial nerves IX,X -> S1/A-delta): [BrainRegionnociceptors of cranial nerves IX,X nociceptors of cranial nerves IX,X] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_JUG AVA.PN.SG.JUG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR HMA.HM.TGM.STR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 S1]
     * nociceptors (nociceptors of cranial nerves X -> S1/A-delta): [BrainRegionnociceptors of cranial nerves X nociceptors of cranial nerves X] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR HMA.HM.TGM.STR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 S1]
    * TRACT: *trigeminothalamic tract, pain awareness*; function: immediate awareness of a painful sensation; path: {head} -> {SII - BA 40,43}
     * face dull, burning pain, deep, aching pain, temperature and crude touch (head, face and intraoral structures -> Precentral Cortex/C): [BrainRegionhead, face and intraoral structures head, face and intraoral structures] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR HMA.HP.PTP.PTR] -> [BrainRegionBGA_FD_TH_IL BGA.FD.TH.IL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PO_PCC SMA.NC.PO.PCC] -> [BrainRegionPrecentral Cortex Precentral Cortex]
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medial_lemniscus TRACT]: *medial lemniscus*; function: transmits touch, vibration sense, proprioception data
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posterolateral_tract TRACT]: *dorsolateral column* (dorsolateral fasciculus, dorsolateral funiculus, posterolateract tract); function: discriminative pain and temperature information (location, intensity and quality)
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spinocervical_pathway TRACT]: *spinocervical tract* (Morin's tract); function: static position, Ruffini endings (thoracic-toward-contralateral and cervical slices); path: {receptors of thoracic and lower limbs, T7-CX} -> {somatosensory cortex}
    * four-neuron, fast-conducting, tactile/pressure pathway from the spinal cord to sensory cortex (tactile/pressure -> S1/A-alpha,A-beta): [BrainRegiontactile/pressure tactile/pressure] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_NP BMA.SC.PH.NP] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV BMA.SC.LH.LCV] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 S1]
    * alerts about presence of cutaneous stimuli that might represent danger, necessitating flight (cutaneous stimuli -> PAG/A-alpha,A-beta): [BrainRegioncutaneous stimuli cutaneous stimuli] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_NP BMA.SC.PH.NP] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV BMA.SC.LH.LCV] -> [BrainRegionFBA_MM_PAG FBA.MM.PAG] -> [BrainRegionPAG PAG]
   * TRACT: *tract of Lissauer, fast pain* (fasciculus of Lissauer, tract/zone of Lissauer; DLF); function: fast pain; intraspinal, discriminative pain and temperature information - location, intensity and quality (pain duration equals to stimulus duration); path: {A-delta pain fibers to hypothalamus, to posterior column} -> {neocortex BA 3b}
    * autonomic and homeostatic functions, and related motivational and affective responses to autonomic function (A-delta -> hypothalamus/A-delta): [BrainRegionA-delta A-delta] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG BMA.SC.PH.MG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN BMA.SC.LH.LSN] -> [BrainRegionHTA_FD_HT HTA.FD.HT] -> [BrainRegionhypothalamus hypothalamus]
    * from lateral LSN; joins fasciculus cuneatus; initial sharp localization of pain (A-delta -> neocortex BA 3b/A-delta): [BrainRegionA-delta A-delta] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG BMA.SC.PH.MG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN BMA.SC.LH.LSN] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU BMA.HM.CU] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionneocortex BA 3b neocortex BA 3b]
    * from medial LSN; joins fasciculus gracilis; initial sharp localization of pain (A-delta -> neocortex BA 3b/A-delta): [BrainRegionA-delta A-delta] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG BMA.SC.PH.MG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN BMA.SC.LH.LSN] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_GR BMA.HM.GR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionneocortex BA 3b neocortex BA 3b]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posterior_column-medial_lemniscus_pathway TRACT]: *posterior column* (dorsal column); function: well-localized discriminative fine touch and proprioception, alpha/beta mechanoreceptors, conscious (discrimination of those sensations that an animal must explore actively)
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuneate_fasciculus TRACT]: *fasciculus cuneatus* (tract of Burdach); function: fine touch, fine pressure, vibration, and proprioception (sacral-toward-contralateral and lumbar slices); path: {receptors of C1-T6 dermatomes} -> {neocortex BA 3b, lateral}
    * conscious sensations of head (geniohyoid (C1), head top (C2), head back above neck (C3) -> S1 medial/A-beta): [BrainRegiongeniohyoid (C1), head top (C2), head back above neck (C3) geniohyoid (C1), head top (C2), head back above neck (C3)] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU BMA.HM.CU] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 medial S1 medial]
    * conscious sensations of neck, trunk, and extremities (neck (C4), trunk (T1-T6), and extremities - arms (C5-T2) -> S1 lateral/A-beta): [BrainRegionneck (C4), trunk (T1-T6), and extremities - arms (C5-T2) neck (C4), trunk (T1-T6), and extremities - arms (C5-T2)] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU BMA.HM.CU] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionS1 lateral S1 lateral]
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gracile_fasciculus TRACT]: *fasciculus gracilis* (tract of Goll); function: tactile and pressure (thoracic-toward-contralateral and cervical slices); path: {lower body} -> {somatosensory cortex}
    * epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body (receptors of thoracic and lower limbs, T7-CX -> neocortex BA 3b, medial/A-beta): [BrainRegionreceptors of thoracic and lower limbs, T7-CX receptors of thoracic and lower limbs, T7-CX] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_GR BMA.HM.GR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 SMA.NC.PG.S1] -> [BrainRegionneocortex BA 3b, medial neocortex BA 3b, medial]
